name: Grunwald 1410
overview: Grunwald 1410 is a two-player tactical turn-based strategy game with elements of strategy board games, similar to the Panzer General series. The game is set during the late Middle Ages. The players take command of Polish-Lithuanian and Teutonic forces during the great battle of Grunwald on 15 July 1410. The game is divided into twenty-two stages, each divided into five turns, such as movement of Polish-Lithuanian troops, firing crossbow, attack on Teutonic troops, movement of Teutonic troops, attack on Polish-Lithuanian troops.
